programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Rhythmic K-pop Hits is a high-energy playlist built to keep your adrenaline pumping and your body moving. Packed with bold beats, dynamic melodies, and electrifying performances, these tracks bring an unstoppable groove to your day. Whether you're working out, dancing, or just looking for an extra burst of energy, this playlist will keep you hyped and ready to go from start to finish!
